<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a BitstreamWriter over a raw&#95;ostream \\p OutStream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p OutStream is a raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream, the BitstreamWriter will write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// directly to the latter&#39;s buffer. In all other cases, the BitstreamWriter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will use an internal buffer and flush at the end of its lifetime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In addition, if \\p is a raw&#95;fd&#95;stream supporting seek, tell, and read</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (besides write), the BitstreamWriter will also flush incrementally, when a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// subblock is finished, and if the FlushThreshold is passed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// NOTE: \\p FlushThreshold&#39;s unit is MB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a5f6ee363763723bf98da451e95bb1d1c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a5f6ee363763723bf98da451e95bb1d1c">BitstreamWriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OutStream, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/writer/bitcodewriter-cpp/#a7a4f14026a779acb2eda1e8107a62f24">FlushThreshold</a> = 512)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : Buffer(getInternalBufferFromStream(OutStream)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FS(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-svector-ostream">raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream</a>&gt;(OutStream) ? &amp;OutStream : nullptr),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/writer/bitcodewriter-cpp/#a7a4f14026a779acb2eda1e8107a62f24">FlushThreshold</a>(uint64&#95;t(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/writer/bitcodewriter-cpp/#a7a4f14026a779acb2eda1e8107a62f24">FlushThreshold</a>) &lt;&lt; 20) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For scenarios where the user wants to access a section of the stream to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (for example) compute some checksum, disable flushing and remember the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockFlushingStartPos = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// resumes flushing, but does not flush, and returns the section in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockFlushingStartPos.reset();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Basic Primitives for emitting bits to the stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Backpatch a byte in the output at the given bit offset with the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a61b26222d7ecfe417406eec38edba698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a61b26222d7ecfe417406eec38edba698">BackpatchByte</a>(uint64&#95;t BitNo, uint8&#95;t NewByte) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support">llvm::support</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ByteNo = BitNo / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t StartBit = BitNo &amp; 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t NumOfFlushedBytes = GetNumOfFlushedBytes();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ByteNo &gt;= NumOfFlushedBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd">endian::readAtBitAlignment</a>&lt;uint8&#95;t, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/#a92fe024386465eeb8aeb7c78371549d7af6b11e8bcea1b0b70051b197f2cb3f84">unaligned</a>&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &amp;Buffer&#91;ByteNo - NumOfFlushedBytes&#93;, StartBit)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected to be patching over 0-value placeholders&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f">endian::writeAtBitAlignment&lt;uint8&#95;t, llvm::endianness::little, unaligned&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &amp;Buffer&#91;ByteNo - NumOfFlushedBytes&#93;, NewByte, StartBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t have a raw&#95;fd&#95;stream, GetNumOfFlushedBytes() should have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returned 0, and we shouldn&#39;t be here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(fdStream() != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the byte offset to backpatch is flushed, use seek to backfill data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, save the file position to restore later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t CurPos = fdStream()-&gt;tell();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy data to update into Bytes from the file FS and the buffer Out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bytes&#91;3&#93;; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use one more byte to silence a warning from Visual C++.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BytesNum = StartBit ? 2 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BytesFromDisk = std::min(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(BytesNum), NumOfFlushedBytes - ByteNo);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BytesFromBuffer = BytesNum - BytesFromDisk;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When unaligned, copy existing data into Bytes from the file FS and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffer Buffer so that it can be updated before writing. For debug builds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read bytes unconditionally in order to check that the existing value is 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as expected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getBlockInfo - If there is block info for the specified ID, return it,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise return null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a75bf3c7fbbde90c257abf2fb5a89badf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a75bf3c7fbbde90c257abf2fb5a89badf">getBlockInfo</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockID) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Common case, the most recent entry matches BlockID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BlockInfoRecords.empty() &amp;&amp; BlockInfoRecords.back().BlockID == BlockID)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BlockInfoRecords.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BlockInfo &amp;BI : BlockInfoRecords)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI.BlockID == BlockID)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#ae6a40b4a5ea89bb8b5076c26e0d0b638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#ae6a40b4a5ea89bb8b5076c26e0d0b638">EnterSubblock</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockID, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CodeLen) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emits the abbreviation \\p Abbv to the stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a032ac42ce93b41ccad6f2380a3efa207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a032ac42ce93b41ccad6f2380a3efa207">EmitAbbrev</a>(std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;BitCodeAbbrev&gt; Abbv) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
